mapper.insert: insert into image (product_id, url, `desc`, created_dtm, created_id, updated_dtm, updated_id) values (#{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatedDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update image set product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_dtm = #{createdDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_id = #{createdId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, updated_dtm = #{updatedDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_id = #{updatedId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, product_id, url, `desc`, created_dtm, created_id, updated_dtm, updated_id from image
select id, product_id, url, `desc`, created_dtm, created_id, updated_dtm, updated_id from image where product_id= #{productID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
